property.name: description
property.value: Display data using util.inspect() to render a more human-readable form. Any data accepted by util.inspect() can be displayed. The title may be used by the host to label the output in some way, either by labeling a display window or prepending the printed text with the title. The resulting text is passed through to the output in case a model wishes to ensure that the image has been displayed before something else happens or the model wishes to use the rendered text in some way.
